alert.note: Alert for Hennepin; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 10:10PM CDT until further notice by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Crow River at Rockford affecting Hennepin and Wright Counties. .The combination of snow melt runoff and forecast rainfall will continue to increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Crow River at Rockford. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 15.6 feet, Water reaches the underside steel on the Bridge Street bridge. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 915 PM CDT Friday, the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 15.3 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.1 feet on 06/25/2014. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
